detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Top in soft velour with appliqués and embroidery on the front. Long raglan sleeves, concealed press-studs at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section, pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Shirt in a cotton twill weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved, ankle-length jumpsuit in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, diagonal side pockets and covered elastication and a tie belt at the waist. Slightly wider, tapered legs with a seam just above the knees.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey with a square neckline front and back and short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves.
Glittery Alice band with appliqués in the shape of antlers, a bow and ears on top. Grosgrain lining inside.
Pyjamas with a jersey Henley top and flannel bottoms. Top with a button placket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a print motif, wrapover hood, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Straight legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Bell-shaped skirt in soft imitation leather with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and a visible zip at the back. Lined.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and rib-trimmed neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Shirt jacket in soft, supple suede with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, yoke with fringing, pockets in the side seams and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, buttons down the front and a tie-detail hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Cardigan in chunky-knit, soft wool with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bolero in a soft, fine knit with a fluffy finish. Fastening at the top with a faceted, heart-shaped button, and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with a large collar, zip and wind flap down the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.

Set with three long-sleeved bodysuits and three pairs of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Wrapover bodysuits with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short, straight-cut tunic in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Sturdy bucket bag in imitation leather with a handle and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Drawstring and magnetic press-stud at the top. Unlined. Size 14.5x29x30 cm.

Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar and fleece-lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and narrow elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft fleece inside.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.

Fully lined bikini with a shimmering metallic pattern. Halterneck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a decorative, shimmering gold-coloured plastic ring at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with a decorative, shimmering gold-coloured plastic ring at each side.
Joggers in airy, lightweight jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Set of three different shades of peel-off nail polish. 3x6 ml. Easy to remove - no nail polish remover required.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Double-layered yoke with a seam and pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Jersey top with a round neck, opening with a button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and short dolman sleeves.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers, pyjamas and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs at one side and at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet. All-in-one pyjamas with press-studs down the front and the insides of the legs, and full feet. Hat with a turned-up hem.
Wide blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a yoke and button at the top and long, elasticated sleeves. Seam and a contrasting patterned section at the hem.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and reversible sequin panels down the sides of the legs (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Soft brushed inside.
Short blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and an open back with a button at the back of the neck and ties at the hem. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Shorts in airy, softly draping silk. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with a regular waist, a ribbed section on the inside at the back of the waist and a concealed drawstring at the front. Zip fly and slim legs.

Long, oversized cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, a zip down the front, flap front pockets with no fasteners, and a drawstring at the hem.
Long necklace with a narrow chain made from recycled metal. Chain pendant with a sparkly stone at the bottom and a tear-shaped pendant covered in sparkly stones. Length approx. 72 cm. No fastener.
Socks in a soft rib knit with elasticated, frill-trimmed tops.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Tailored trousers in a stretch weave with two press-studs at the waist and a zip fly. Zipped front pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, straight legs.

Jersey dance dress with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and a detachable, patterned mesh cape. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt in two layers of tulle, the top layer with a frill at the hem. Lined gusset.

Grained imitation leather clutch bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap, one zipped inner compartment and six card slots. Size approx. 5.5x12x20 cm.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.

Concentrated, scented machine and hand wash laundry liquid for bright, white results even at low temperatures. Designed to magic away stains too with the help of enzymes. For all types of laundry (30-90°C). Select 30°C to save energy (your laundry will be just as clean). Free from phosphates, zeolites and bleach. Made in a climate-neutral factory in Vadstena, Sweden. 9 washes (medium water). 500 ml. For contents and further information see www.hm.com/takecare.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Knot detail at the front and a metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Short, fitted dress in soft, stretch jersey with a pattern made from studs on both the front and back. Round neckline at the front, a V-neck at the back, padded shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.

Slightly shorter halterneck top in a patterned weave with decorative ties at the back of the neck and an opening at the front. Seam under the bust with a drawstring that ties at the sides, and a frill at the hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Fully lined, textured swimsuit with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed elastication under the bust and a low-cut back.
Pyjama bottoms in a striped linen weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit with straight, wide legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Elasticated velour scrunchies.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets and bellows front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, elastication at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder top in slub cotton jersey with a wide elasticated top edge and 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lace panels at the front and down the sleeves. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has a small opening and concealed button at the back. Long sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and silk blend jersey.
Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with narrow shoulder straps and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fitted, smocked top woven in a linen blend with elasticated shoulder straps, buttons down the front and frill trims.
Short, sleeveless, A-line dress in soft organic cotton satin. Double-layered yoke, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and gathered tiers to the hem for added width. Unlined.

Bra in soft microfibre with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the back to hold the bra in place. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with striped ribbing in a contrasting colour around the neckline. Cuffed sleeves and a sweatshirt fabric trim at the hem.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Rectangular shoulder bag in a sturdy weave with a zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable nylon shoulder strap. Lined. Size 4x12x17 cm.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.
Short, cold shoulder top in a patterned, crinkled weave with narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a frill trim at the top.
